name: Maintenance (SunJam 2016)
description:
Its the end of the world and you are the only mechanic in this shanty town, you are tasked with managing the resources (Water, Sewerage, Intranet and Power). If you let these fail the town will fall to raiders and you will die.

Made by Daniel Payne and Coby Jennings.

Update Sep 4th, 2016

We are currently working hard to completely overhaul the game starting with the graphics, or lack of. The reason for the lack of graphics and systems is because we originally had released this game as a Game Jam project.
